# Brigo: The AI-Powered Study Companion

Brigo is a mobile-first AI study platform designed to help students optimize their learning through advanced AI tools.

## Core Features
- **Exam Prediction**: Predicts likely exam questions based on uploaded notes and past questions.
- **Smart Flashcards**: Automatically generates interactive flashcards from study materials.
- **Notes to Podcasts**: Transforms text-based notes into high-quality audio summaries for learning on the go.
- **AI-Powered Insights**: Provides deep analysis of study materials to highlight key concepts.

## Value Proposition
Brigo helps students "stop guessing what to study" and focus on what actually matters for their exams. It is optimized for mobile study sessions.

## Target Audience
- High school and university students.
- Lifelong learners using mobile devices.

## Resources
- Website: https://brigo.app
- App Store: https://brigo.app (Mobile App)
- Support: support@brigo.app
